Workshop and Hackathon

We are pleased to share that The Palaeontological Association has decided to fund our upcoming event “R for Palaeobiologists: Workshop and Hackathon” via the Grant-in-Aid scheme (PA-GA202203).
Jan 9, 2023
Lewis A. Jones

Website launch!

We are pleased to announce the launch of the Palaeoverse website! Please feel free to take a look around and make the most of the resources available. If you notice any issues, please get in touch and let us know!
Jan 1, 2023
Lewis A. Jones
